channel.title: [TUT] How to make your NPC (with its own level) [TUT]
channel.description:
[center][center][size=20pt][u][b] How To Make Your Own Pet![/b][/u][/size]
[/center]
[b][u]Difficult Rank:[/u][/b] 1/10 [i](literally)[/i] [b][u]Requirments:[/u][/b] A client derr. and you may need a brain!
[hr]
Ok.
[u][b]1.[/b][/u] First open up your Class5.java
[u][b]2.[/b][/u] In there scroll down until you see some new npcs that where added into the client
[u][b]3.[/b][/u] Take a look at this code i made:
[code]if(i == 51) //chosen npc to change name of {
class5.anInt61 = 999999999; // Level class5.aString65 = "Laurie's Pet"; class5.aByteArray89 = "BEWARE".getBytes(); }[/code]
[hr]
ok. time to explain it.
The [b]if(i == 51)[/b] is the chosen npc id that you intend to change the name of.
The [b]class5.anInt61 = 999999999; // Level[/b] is the level of your pet
The [b]class5.aString65 = "Laurie's Pet";[/b] is the name of the pet
The [b]class5.aByteArray89 = "BEWARE".getBytes(); [/b] Is the examine of the pet.
[hr]
so now i've explained it you can add it to your client and edit it abit so it fits your likings.
Here is a picture of my pet!
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/xe0cy8.png[/img][/center]

item.title: [TUT] How to make your NPC (with its own level) [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @owner_of_superscape owner of superscape
item.description:
@owner_of_superscape wrote:

Berky-Scape:

you can change that in berky-scape go to npc.handler search for hitdrif untill you see some npc’s add your own npc’s there with starting hit and highest hit and he hit like that if you want a better tut from this pm me on moparscape ok?

thanks for explaining that to some of the people here.

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] How to make your NPC (with its own level) [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

[quote=“cannoli, post:4, topic:229583”]isnt this just changing the name/examine info/level of any npc you want?

does it do tricks?[/quote]

Basically. The idea of changing the monster name and level is cool, but calling it “How to make your own pet” isn’t the appropriate title for it, more like “NPC Name & Level Changing”; It’d be different if the pet followed you around and, yeah done tricks but it doesn’t.

Read full topic
